body.name: 200 Pieces Disposable Razor Bulk for Men Individually Wrapped Twin Blades Shaving Razor Mens Razors for Shaving Safety Hotel Guest House Travel Home Use Portable, Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 44 mins
features: A large amount of quantities: there are 200 pieces of men's disposable razors in the package, abundant quantities can satisfy your daily needs for trimming your beard; Sharing them with your family members is also allowable

Portable to take along: each of these disposable twin blade razors is individually packed with a clear OPP bag, and thus you can put it in your makeup pouch without wrapping it, preventing it from getting dirty

Reliable twin blade: shaving razors for men disposable are made of stainless steel razor head that is designed into twin blade, providing you with better trimming performance, saving your time and energy; And the shell is made of plastic, not easy to break

Easy grip handle: these dual razor blades incorporate seahorse elements, with anti slip stripes, more comfortable to hold, helping you to control your shave when using them as well; And they are about 4.5 inches/ 11.5 cm in whole length, easy to grip
Widely applicable: manual razors for men can be applied for many occasions, including hotels, motels, business trips, camping, guestrooms, dormitories, travel and more, universal and versatile
body.description: Features: Safe to operate: Each men double edge razor is equipped with a small cap that is simple to put on and off, scratch proof when it is not in use, and cleaner after using. Sweet gift: You can send safety razors for men to your boyfriend, husband, fiance, roommates, neighbors, colleagues, father and more on Father's Day, Christmas, Valentine's Day and other days of memorization. Specifications: Material: plastic and stainless steel with OPP bag Color: blue Size: approx. 4.5 inches/ 11.5 cm in whole length Total: 200 pieces Package includes: 200 x Dual razor blades Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist slight difference due to different screen displays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bulk purchase
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for inclusion in bags for giveaway and they were a great value. They were packaged well. Very few, were missing covers, and they were uniform. They're not individually wrapped, but that's okay since we want to reduce the use of non-recyclable plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect in all regards. I use these razors daily on clients to shave the area on them prior to tattooing their body. These razors r individually wrapped and arrive within 2days of ordering. Haven't had any broken razors in my orders as of now, unlike the last place I ordered from when I would have about 5-10% broken razor heads per order from shipping. That was most likely due to those razors being unwrapped rather than individually packaged like these ones
